abstract: St Lawrence County, NY, Board of Legislators passes unusual resolution of no confidence in District Attorney Mary E Rain, Republican, and asks Gov Andrew Cuomo to open inquiry into her conduct; cites list of allegations against Rain, which include sexual harassment in her office, firings and resignations of several assistant district attorneys and accusations of fraud.
lead_paragraph: After a series of unflattering episodes, lawmakers in the northern New York county delivered a rare rebuke to Mary E. Rain and asked the governor to open an inquiry into her conduct.

headline.main: St. Lawrence County Board Votes ‘No Confidence’ in District Attorney
headline.print_headline: Upstate Prosecutor’s Actions Lead to Rare Rebuke by County Board

snippet: After a series of unflattering episodes, lawmakers in the northern New York county delivered a rare rebuke to Mary E. Rain and asked the governor to open an inquiry into her conduct.
